snippet: Aleksei A. Navalny, Russia’s most prominent opposition leader, is accused of calling a Moscow politician a “drug addict,” a charge he denies.
lead_paragraph: Aleksei A. Navalny, Russia’s most prominent opposition leader, is accused of calling a Moscow politician a “drug addict,” a charge he denies.

headline.main: Russian Opposition Figure Faces Accusations of Libel
headline.print_headline: Russian Opposition Figure Faces Accusations of Libel
